Yawan cutar coVID-19 a cikin European Union/European Economic Area da United Kingdom, 1 Janairu zuwa 15 Maris 2020

kididdigar yawan yaduwar cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ta nuna ayyukan da ke da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe masu ƙungiyar Turai / Ƙungiyar Kasuwancin Turai da Birtaniya wanda ya tabbatar cewa, yayin da a cikin ƙasashen da ke da alaƙa, cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba da ci gaba a duk ƙasashe.

Bayan nasarar daga Italiya, ƙasashe, asibitocin da ƙungiyoyin lafiya masu ƙarfi suna karɓar ƙimar shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙarin shawarwari don ƙ
A ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019, kungiyar ciwon jini da asali ba a san ba ta bayyana a Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana cutar a matsayin cutar kwayar cutar da ake kira kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar kwayar cutar k
Bayan haka, cutar da aka samu daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance sunan cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).
ƙididdiga zuwa yanzu cewa ca 80% na mutane da cutar COVID-19 suna da lafiya mai tsanani, i.e. cutar lafiya ta ƙafafu da ke da ko kuma ba da pneumonia, kuma akwai yawa daga cikinsu sun samu nasara.
A cikin kwanaki 14%, COVID-19 ya zama cutar da ta yi karuwa zuwa cutar da ke buƙatar ajiye a asibiti, yayin da kashi 6% na cututtukan da ke buƙatar ajiye a asibiti.
Mace-mace na masu ruwan kaya da suka shiga saboda COVID-19 ana ƙiƙirƙirƙir da 4%.
A cikin wannan bincike, muna ƙididdige haɗarin COVID-19 a cikin kowane ƙasa na European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) da United Kingdom (UK) da kuma suka kwatanta su da Hubei Province, China.
Kuma muna kallon yawan marasa lafiya na COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya da kuma a Italiya a cikin 31 ga Janairu zuwa 15 ga Maris 2020.
Shari'o'in COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da UK
Bayan China, COVID-19 ya yi fice a fadin duniya kuma yanayin cutar ta COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen duniya na yanzu ya yi da wannan ƙasa.
A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya bayyana COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiya.

A cikin taron Eurosurveillance na 5 ga watan Maris na shekara ta 2020, Spiteri da sauran su sun bayyana a cikin taron na farko na COVID-19 a cikin yankin Turai kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin bayanan WHO.
A cikin EU/EEA, an bayyana na farko uku na tabbatarwa ne da aka bayyana a kasar Faransa a ranar 24 ga Janairu 2020 a cikin mutane da suka dawo daga Wuhan, jihar Hubei, kasar Sin.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, an tabbatar da cutar COVID-19 a duk 30 kasashe na EU/EEA da Burtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019 da wannan ranar, an bayyana 39,768 cututtuka da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 cututtuka da 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.
Samun adadin juna da adadin juna na COVID-19

A cibiyar European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) ana saita adadin cututtukan COVID-19 a kowace kasar duniya, wanda aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin jama'a kamar ma ofishin ministan kiwon lafiya, hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ƙasa da ƙasa da kuma WHO, ana saita a kowace rana a 8:00 a.m.
An yi amfani da wannan bayanai don yin bayyana kan hanyoyin cutar COVID-19 a cikin EU/EEA da UK, da kuma yin bayyana kan hanyoyin da suka yi a Italiya.

A matsayin wakilcin yawan cutar COVID-19, muka yi imanin cewa 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, don haka tare da amincewa da tsarin rayuwa na COVID-19, a kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da Burtaniya, a cikin lokacin 1 ga Janairu–15 ga Maris 2020.

Kuma muka gabatar da adadin kowane kasar da aka bayyana a matsayin a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020 8:00 a.m. kamar yadda aka bayyana a Italiya a cikin lokacin 31 ga watan Janairu-15 ga watan Maris 2020.
Trend na COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya
Tasirin ƙarshe na COVID-19 a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya ya yi daidai da tasirin Hubei Province (China) (Rana 1).

A cikin EU/EEA da Burtaniya cikin gaba, ƙididdiga ta ƙididdiga ta COVID-19 ta fara karuwa a kusan 21 ga watan Fabrairu kuma ta ci gaba da karuwa a kusan 28 ga watan Fabrairu 2020 (Supplementary material).

Wannan ya kasance galibi daga cikin karuwar sauri a cikin yawan rahoton cututtukan daga Italiya, amma duk kasashen EU/EEA da kuma Burtaniya sun nuna tashin hankali a cikin yawan cututtukan COVID-19 (Supplementary material).
Bayanin 2 yana nuna adadin COVID-19 na kowane lokaci, a kasashen EU/EEA da Burtaniya da kuma a Italiya don lokacin 31 ga Janairu zuwa 15 ga Maris 2020.

A cikin MERS, a cikin binciken demography a watan Yunin 2012, mace-mace ya kasance 37% na 2,494 ayyukan tabbatarwa.

Corticosteroids da tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, ana amfani da su don shirya cytokine storm.

Ayyukan da aka yi don kawar da cytokine storm sun hada da modulating of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
Steroids, a matsayin immunosuppressants, ana amfani da su a cikin ilimin cutar SARS don ragewa yanayin ciwon cutar.
Duk da haka, steroid a cikin doza da yawa ba shi da nasara ga cututtukan cututtuka a cikin cututtukan SARS da COVID-19.

A kan bambance-bambancen a cikin jeri na protein, CoVs ana ƙididdige su cikin hudu (alpha-CoV, beta-CoV, gamma-CoV da delta-CoV), daga cikin wadannan beta-CoV genera yana da HCoVs mafi yawan kuma ana ƙididdige su cikin hudu (A, B, C da D).
Binciken phylogenetic ya nuna cewa wasan kwaikwayo da yawa suna da asalin kwayoyin halitta na alpha-CoVs da beta-CoVs, yayin da tsuntsaye ne ke cikin kantin kayayyaki na gamma-CoVs da delta-CoVs.
Don shekaru da dama, CoVs suna daidaita kai tsaye a cikin kai tsaye da kuma yawancin suka fito a matsayin abubuwan lafiya masu mahimmanci ga mutane.
Har yanzu, an san mutum CoVs (HCoVs) bakwai.
Daga cikinsu HCoV-229E da HCoV-NL63 suna cikin alpha-CoVs.
Ƙungiyoyin beta-CoVs biyar na farko sun hada da HCoV-OC43, HCoV-HKU1, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (SARS-CoV), Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) da SARS-CoV-2.

HCoV-NL63 aka samu daga ɗan karamin shekaru 7 daga kasar Holland a karshen 2004.
An fara gano shi a matsayin mafi girma a cikin yara, masu shekaru da masu rauni da masu rauni da cututtuka na hankali.
Gabatarwa na coryza, conjunctivitis, kuka, da bronchiolitis ita ce mafi yawan cutar da ke da alaƙa da HCoV-NL63.
Babban bincike mai zaman kansa ya bayyana izinin samun na virus na wannan daga samari na hanci daga ɗan karamin ɗan shekaru 8 wanda ke fama da pneumonia a Netherlands.
Ba da daɗewa ba, an tabbatar da shi a Netherlands, amma yanzu yana daidaita duniya.

Bangladesh ya bayyana mutanen biyu da suka mutu sakamakon CVID-19, mafi girma na rana
A ranar alheri Bangladesh ta tabbatar da cewa an kashe mutane biyar a ranar alheri sakamakon COVID-19.
Wannan shine kwanaki mafi yawan mutuwar da aka samu saboda cuta.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana adadin masu cutarwa da aka kiyasta wanda ya haɗa da 114 masu cutarwa masu aiki da 33 masu dawowa masu zama gida.
An raba 17 mutuwa.
A taron labarai na online, shugaban IEDCR, Dr. Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka rasu sun hada da mata da maza hudu.
Kamar yadda Dr Meerjady ya bayyana, biyu daga cikinsu sun kasance a cikin shekaru 60, biyu a tsakanin 51 da 60, kuma ɗaya 41-50 shekaru.
Ta kuma ce biyu daga cikin wadanda suka mutu ne daga Dhaka.
Hukumar lafiya ta duniya (WHO) ta tabbatar da COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiyar a ranar 11 ga watan Maris.

Shugaban hukumar jirgin kasa ya ce wani daga cikin mutanen da suka mutu shi ne Jalal Saifur Rahman, shugaban kungiyar kare haƙƙin ƙasa ta Bengali, wanda aka ba da shawara a cikin hukumar jirgin kasa ta Kuwait Maitree.

A ranar Laraba, a cikin sanarwar video ta online, Ministan Bangladeshi Road Transport da Bridges Obaidul Quader ya ce ayyukan jirgin kasa za a dakatar da su don lokaci mai tsawon da aka shirya, har zuwa ranar Laraba da ke zuwa.
Yanayin aikin jirgin kasa na farko ya fara ne a ranar 26 ga watan Maris kuma an zaɓi ya ƙare a ranar Lahadi, 4 ga watan Afrilu.
Amfani da kayayyaki masu mahimmanci -- tattalin arzikin lafiya, mai da abinci -- an zaɓa.
Matsayin farko na COVID-19 da aka yi rajista a Bangladesh ya faru ne a ranar 8 ga watan Maris, a cikin mutane biyu da suka dawo daga Italiya kuma kuma matar daya daga cikinsu.
A ranar 19 ga watan Maris, an tabbatar da cewa an samar da su.
SARS-CoV-2 ya kai miliyan ɗaya a duniya
A ranar Alhamis, adadin cututtukan SARS-CoV-2 coronavirus ya kai kashi ɗaya cikin miliyan ɗaya a duniya, bayanin Jami'ar Johns Hopkins ya nuna.
A kusa da 52,000 mutuwa suna da alaƙa da COVID-19, cutar da ke haifar da cutar coronavirus.
Milestone ya zo a wannan ranar Malawi ya tabbatar da cutar coronavirus ta farko da Zambia ta yi kisan kwayar cutar coronavirus.
Kasar Koriya ta bayyana, a ranar Alhamis, cewa ita ce ɗaya daga cikin ƙasashe da yawa wanda ba a samu cutar korona ba.

Kamar yadda Dr. Tom Frieden, wanda ya kasance shugaban Amurka's Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, ya ce "unprecedented."
Ya ce, a cikin bayanin da CNN ta buga a watan Fabrairu, "cikin kwayar cutar jini, ba kowace cuta ta hawan jini ba ta kasancewa ana kiyaye ta daga fitowar ta zuwa ci gaba da fadada duniya."
Ghebreyesus ya bayyana a cikin wannan tsari, yana ce "ba a ƙiyayya ba muka sami pandemiyar da aka ƙirƙiri ta cutar coronavirus."
Ya ci gaba da cewa, "kuma ba a gani ba a cikin tarihi da yawa wanda zai iya karewa a wannan lokacin."

Bayyanar da matsayin pandemiyar da aka yi a cikin wannan lokacin ya bi da ra'ayin WHO a watan Janairu da aka yi a cikin wannan lokacin don tabbatar da cewa zubar da cutar ya zama matsala ta lafiyar jama'a ta duniya.

Wannan cutar ta farko da aka sani a cikin cutar coronavirus ta farko ta iya zama a 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.
A cikin wata, yawan cutar coronavirus a Hubei ya karu.

Wannan ya kasance akai-akai yana da alaƙa da Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, wanda kuma ya sayar da dabbobi masu rayuwa, kuma wani tsari shi ne cewa cutar ta fito ne daga ɗaya daga cikin nau'ikan dabbobi; ko kuma, a cikin saƙon, ta ƙunshi asali na zoonotic.A pneumonia cluster of unknown cause was observed on 26 December and treated by the doctor Zhang Jixian in Hubei Provincial Hospital, who informed the Wuhan Jianghan CDC on 27 December.
A ranar 30 ga Disamba, ƙungiyar ɗalibai a ƙaramar hukumar jirgin kasa ta Wuhan ta bayyana ga abokan aikinsu game da "coronavirus na SARS".

Na biyar daga cikin doctarsu, ciki har da Li Wenliang, an yi watsi da su daga jami'an siyasa don tayar da labarai masu son rana, kuma ɗayan, Ai Fen, an yi watsi da shi daga mukamansa saboda sauya tsarin.

A wannan ranar shugaban kasa Trump ya sanya a cikin shari'ar cutar coronavirus Preparedness da Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, wanda ya ba da $8.3 biliyoyin kudaden shiga a matsayin kudaden shiga na shari'a don hukumomin tarayya su yi wajibi ga cutar.
Kungiyoyin masu aiki suka buƙaci haɗin haɗi ga ƙungiyoyin masu aiki, suka ƙaddamar da taron, da suka ƙaddamar da masu aiki don aiki daga gida.

A ranar da ta gabata, ya ƙayyade iyakar da ta haɗa da Birtaniya da Ireland.

A ranar 17 ga watan Maris, ya kasance an tabbatar da cutar a cikin jihar 50 kuma a cikin jihar Columbia. A ranar 23 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa birnin New York ya sami 10,700 cutar coronavirus, da yawa daga yawan cututtukan South Korea.
A ranar 25 ga Maris, gwamnan ya ce cikin jama’a ya fara aiki, saboda ayyukan da aka yi ya dawo daga 2.0 rana zuwa 4.7 rana.

A ranar 28 ga watan Maris, akwai 32,308 na cututtukan da aka tabbatar da su a birnin New York, da kuma mutane 672 da suka mutu daga cutar. A ranar 8 ga watan Afrilu, 400,335 na cututtukan da aka tabbatar da su a Amurka, da kuma mutane 12,841 da suka mutu.
A ranar 30 ga watan Maris, an bayyana cewa shugaban kasar Amurka Trump ya yanke shawarar ci gaba da ayyukan jama'a har zuwa 30 ga watan Afrilu.
A wannan ranar, USNS Comfort, motar asibiti tare da kusan 1000 coci, ta shiga New York.

A cikin ƙarancin ƙwarewa, a cikin Maris 2020, ba ƙasashe ba su da rahoton daidaitaccen bayyana cutar a cikinsu.
A ranar 23 ga Maris, ba ƙasa ɗaya ba ya yi gwajin kashi 3% na ƙasarsa, kuma akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa a cikin yawan gwajin da aka yi a cikin ƙasashe.

Ta amfani da reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) a lokacin real-time, aikin test na iya aikawa a cikin samfuran numfashi da aka samu ta hanyoyin da dama, ciki har da swab na nasopharyngeal ko samfuran sputum.
Sakamakon su na iya samuwa a cikin sa'o'i da yawa zuwa 2 rana.
Binciken RT-PCR da aka yi tare da swabs na gwiwa ba shi da inganci a cikin mako na farko na cutar.
Bayan haka, cutar zai iya ƙarewa a cikin gwiwa, yayin da yake ci gaba da yaduwa a cikin jini.
A cikin mutane masu cutarwa da ake testa a cikin na biyu, ana iya samar da abubuwan da ke cikin ƙarfe na ƙarfe ta hanyar ƙarfe na ƙarfe ko kuma ana iya amfani da abubuwan da ke cikin ƙarfe (sputum).

Gwajin PCR na farko ne da aka yi a Charité a Berlin a watan Janairu 2020 tare da amfani da gwajin polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), da ke da alaƙa da 250,000 kit da aka bayar da shi ta Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO).

Jamhuriyar Tarayyar Burtaniya kuma ta haɗa wani test a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech ta haɗa wani kit na PowerChek Coronavirus (PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection) a ranar 28 ga watan Janairu 2020.

Ita tana son "E" gene da ke daidai da duk beta coronaviruses, da RdRp gene da ke daidai da SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
